message.content:
cs.AI, cs.MA, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.SY. 

The paper presents a new algorithm for multi-agent decision problems formalized as DEC-POMDPs, which is a topic that falls under the intersection of several sub-fields in computer science. The use of Monte-Carlo methods and policy iteration suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The fact that the algorithm is designed for multi-agent problems suggests a focus on multi-agent systems (cs.MA) and robotics (cs.RO). Finally, the use of a new policy representation and the focus on scalability suggests a focus on control systems (cs.SY).
